file_content.text: I've got a few more adjustments to make. I'll take it from here. Thanks for your help.
Fantastic! The temperature's already dropping. We'll be at full power in a few minutes. You did a good thing. Thank you.
Glad I could help.
About time we're through.
Where's my pay?
You deserve something for your trouble. Thanks again.
What are you waiting for? The clock is ticking!
Don't be afraid. Your droid sent me. I'm here to rescue you.
Where were you when those savages were slaughtering my coworkers? Forget it. I've got bigger problems right now.
I was sent here to complete a mission and that's exactly what I'm going to do. Argh! I can't do this without tools!
This generator supplies power to Fort Garnik--it's been sabotaged. It overheats and the fort's defenses, the infirmary... they'll all go down. People are going to die.
Then you better get to work. I'll stand guard for you.
So fix it.
I'll help.
You should be grateful.
Yes, thank you. Happy? Now let's try to save the war effort.
Our equipment was scattered in the attack. I can hold the generator steady, but I need my tools and the liquid coolant to fix it.
I'll try to find them for you.
Tools and coolant. Got it.
I might get lucky and run into some more separatists. I could use the target practice.
I'm itching for a fight.
Move fast. We don't have a lot of time.
Right. Whatever.
I'll take that as a "yes."
